local_intent: Perceive the white_box, approach and align to it with 1 cm tolerance, then verify arrival at the target.
assumptions: Prior detection/grasp planning may have been done; no obstacles blocking approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: checks visibility, performs ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01 and timeout 2000 ms, then verifies proximity using IsAt. Fits between detection/pose computation and grasp steps in the GLOBAL_BT.
